get.description: Returns 8-K forms related to cybersecurity incidents (Item 1.05 or Item 8.01), filtered by optional CIK, stock ticker, year, or month.

parameters.description: Country code (2-letter or 3-letter ISO code, e.g. FR or FRA)
parameters.name: country

get.description: Returns all CSIRT/CERT entries for the given country code (ISO Alpha-2 or Alpha-3) from listcert.json.
Returns a list of all known ransomware groups along with the number of victims attributed to each group.
Returns detailed information about a specific ransomware group, including TTPs, tools, victim count, activity period, ransomnotes, and negotiations.

parameters.description: Optional filter to return only groups with this IOC type (e.g. md5, ip, email, btc, etc.)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Returns all ransomware groups that have IOCs, including the types and counts. Use ?type= to filter by a specific IOC type (e.g., ?type=md5). **Note:** No rate limit, but fair use applies.

parameters.description: Optional filter for a specific IOC type (e.g. md5, ip, email)
parameters.name: type

get.description: Returns indicators of compromise (IOCs) for a specific ransomware group. Use ?type= to filter by a specific IOC type (e.g. ip, md5, email, btc). **Note:** No rate limit, but fair use applies.
Returns a list of all unique victim sectors (activities) along with the number of associated victims.
Lists ransomware groups with available negotiation chat logs and the number of chats per group.
Returns metadata for all negotiation chats available for a given ransomware group.
Returns all messages and ransom info (initial, negotiated, paid) for a specific negotiation chat of a group.

parameters.description: Filter by 2-letter ISO country code (e.g. FR, US)
parameters.name: country

get.description: Returns all cyberattack entries from cyberattacks.json, enriched with infostealer and ransomware info, and filtered by optional year, month, and 2-letter ISO country code.

parameters.description: Filter by 2-letter ISO country code (e.g. FR, US)
parameters.name: country

get.description: Returns the 100 most recent entries from cyberattacks.json, enriched with infostealer and ransomware info. Optional filter by 2-letter ISO country code.
Lists all ransomware groups that have available ransom notes and the number of notes per group.
Returns the list of ransomnote filenames available for a specific ransomware group.
Returns the full content of a ransomnote by filename and group, if available in .txt, .html, or .md format.
Returns statistics including number of victims, ransomware groups, press entries, and last update date.
Checks if the provided X-API-KEY is valid and returns the associated client ID.
Returns enriched information for a single victim, identified by Base64-encoded ID (post_title@group_name).

parameters.description: Filter by ransomware group name (e.g., lockbit)
parameters.name: group

parameters.description: Filter by 2-letter country code (e.g., US, FR)
parameters.name: country

get.description: Returns a list of victims filtered by at least one of the query parameters. Default date filtering uses 'discovered' date unless 'date=published' is specified.

parameters.description: Sort by 'discovered' (default: Date of discovering the victim by ransomware.live) or 'attacked' (estimated attack date)
parameters.name: order

get.description: Returns enriched information for the last 100 victims.

parameters.description: Filter by ransomware group name (e.g., lockbit)
parameters.name: group

parameters.description: Filter by 2-letter country code (e.g., US, FR)
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Sort by 'discovered' (default: Date discovered by ransomware.live) or 'attacked' (estimated attack date).
parameters.name: order

get.description: Searches victims by keyword in post_title or website, with optional filters by group, sector, country, and sort order.
Lists all ransomware groups that have associated YARA rule files available.
Returns the content of YARA rule files available for a specific ransomware group.

info.title: Ransomware.live API PRO
info.description:
Free authenticated API for advanced users :
  • Check https://www.ransomware.live/api for more details
  • See https://my.ransomware.live for free api key.
